metadata.name: Expected Manager (you can leave this blank)
Referral Cheat Sheet
metadata.value:
Here is what to consider when thinking about who to refer:

"Minimum of 3 Years Experience is Supply chain Management: Proficiency in understanding and optimizing supply chain processes, including warehouse operations, logistics, inventory management, distribution, procurement and health and safety		
People Management: Demonstrated ability to manage a minimum of 4 people with a good inter-personal relationship		
Demand Forecasting: Ability to use predictive analytics to estimate demand for our programs (credit, retail and trees)		
Critical and Problem Solving Skills: Ability to identify issues and risks within the supply chain and develop solutions to address them promptly and effectively. Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to improve supply chain efficiency and effectiveness and strong knowledge of analytical tools, e.g. google sheet, BI		""		
Supply Chain Management Tools: Familiarity with supply chain tools and systems  such as Warehouse Management System, SAP, Odoo to to track inventory, manage orders, and streamline operations

"We are looking for candidates with the following qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Analytics, Applied Mathematics, Quantitative Economics, or another relevant field.

5+ years of experience in a strategic data and/or analytical role.

Technology skills / fluency: 
- Advanced Google Sheets / Excel (can develop and maintain complex spreadsheets), Google Workspace & Microsoft Office.
- Strong statistics and analytical skills and experience in R, CommCare, Kobo and other data collection, analysis and data visualization tools will be key.""
Strong project management - exceptional judgment and ability to manage and balance multiple strategic projects and priorities at once. Demonstrated ability working across teams and functions on technical projects
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 
Proven experience managing and upskilling a team."
